entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Natrona, south central Johnson and southeastern Washakie Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 200 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cottonwood Pass, which is also 36 miles northeast of Shoshoni, moving east at 30 mph.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Johnson County
